name: 2D (Rik Boerma, Shamboat, sabarrel, Daniel Stander)
description:
2D is a puzzle platforming game where you swap between two alternate dimensions and flip gravity upside down in order to solve puzzles and make your way through the space ship! This project was made over the course of 4 days as part of the Breda University of Applied Sciences 2023 Block C game jam with the following people:
Maud Bakker

Saúl Barambones

Georgi Babushkin

Daniël Stander

Rik Boerma
